sendMessage(Message) - Method in interface core.IMessageProvider
 
sendMessage(Message) - Method in class core.MessageProvider
This method is used to send a message, if it needs to be send right now it just calls the send method of the super class, if it should be sent at a specific time the MessageProvider creates a new TimerTask with the MessageScheduler
